attributes.action: De valuate the  Bible   and remove it from schools and law courts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The bible is not a work of fact, in these harsh times , it is imperitive that we only use tried and tested methods of engagment. The bible is incorrect, and should be removed from our childrens learning, Law courts, and any other function. It has been disproven by Darwin and other great scientific bodies.
